ComicInfo.Series: Rick and Morty: Pocket Like You Stole It
ComicInfo.Summary:
Morty has made it through the labyrinth, and arrived at the Council of Ricks. Now he just has to gain entrance, defeat all the Ricks, and free all the Morties. Should be totally doable for a Morty, or not, who cares, the multiverse is endless and nothing matters - except for the epic finale of Rick and Morty: Pocket Like You Stole It!
